text: Geras is the god of old age in Greek mythology. Geras may also refer to: * Geras, Austria, a municipality * Geras Abbey, an abbey in Austria * Norman Geras, political scientist * Adèle Geras, children's author * Geras (Mortal Kombat), Mortal Kombat character ==See also== * Gera (disambiguation)
title: Geras (disambiguation)
